featured.text: Capoeiristas learned to camouflage the forbidden fights with singing, clapping, and dancing as though it were simply entertainment.

definition.zh_def: 巴西的一種武術和舞蹈，結合了音樂和體育，參與者稱為「卡波耶拉者」。
definition.en_def: Practitioners of capoeira, a Brazilian martial art that combines elements of dance, acrobatics, and music.
definition.example: The capoeiristas performed an impressive display of agility and rhythm during the festival.
